Articles.Content:
A rocket capable of fitting into Cargo Bay Mk3 , Deorbit Duna 315km, Land Duna, Orbit Duna 315km with 5 passenger seats is being desired.

RULES:

No Clipping

Full Stock

No Airhogging

Winning Standards:

Top 5 aesthetics will be given into voting, winner will be determined publicly.

Shouldn't this be in Challenges?

I think it's meant to be a request.

Rune. Then again, there's not even a "please" in there.

Clearly a challenge not a request...

Yes this should be in the challenges section.
I totally already have one, except it only has one seat :\ That and why 315 km? Mine can do 60km, so I wonder what reason there is to require it go higher.
